The winner's nominator wins a dozen magnums of champagne .
Doyle checked his forty-five magnum , then slotted it back into the holster on his back belt .
If someone gets hit by a magnum bullet , he is dead .
Mortally wounded , but clutching the magnum pistol he always carried , he crawled between two parked cars in a place called Freedom Square .
